mapper.select: SELECT h.* ,m.name AS tname FROM ( SELECT * FROM HEALTHDATE WHERE hnum = #{hnum} ) h LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER m ON h.tid = m.id

SELECT o.tid ,o.mid as id ,o.name AS tname ,TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') - TO_DATE(o.odate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS hdate ,t.activity AS tactivity FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM USAGE ) u INNER JOIN ORDERS o ON u.onum = o.onum ) o INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON o.tid = m.id ) o INNER JOIN TRAINER t ON o.tid = t.id AND o.mid = #{id}

SELECT SUM(playtime) AS playtime ,hdate FROM ( SELECT hnum ,SUM(playtime) AS playtime FROM ( SELECT hnum ,ROUND((endtime - starttime) * 24 * 60) AS playtime FROM HEALTH ) GROUP BY hnum ) h INNER JOIN HEALTHDATE hd ON h.hnum = hd.hnum AND hdate = #{date} AND id = #{id} GROUP BY hdate

SELECT SUM(playtime) FROM ( SELECT SUM(playtime) AS playtime ,hdate FROM ( SELECT hnum ,SUM(playtime) AS playtime FROM ( SELECT hnum ,ROUND((endtime - starttime) * 24 * 60) AS playtime FROM HEALTH ) GROUP BY hnum ) h INNER JOIN HEALTHDATE hd ON h.hnum = hd.hnum AND (hdate BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate}) AND id = #{id} GROUP BY hdate )
